name: Carnival of Fragility
description:
In a mysterious carnival where your dices are fragile.

Gamble with your life (dice) and seek to break the gates to the exit of this hellish carnival, if you lose all your dices you will die!

Objective:
At the main gate (very bottom tile of the map),  roll a 6 to breaks the locks!

Dices have limited uses
Common - 3 
Silver - 2
Gold - 1 

Controls:
Hover over a dice to check its numbers.
Then click on the dice to use it.

Credits:
Hibiki Takaku - Programming
Yui Maehara - Art
Edgardo Ramirez - Music/SFX
